snippet.title: Sword Reverie Official Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
Sword Reverie is a JRPG inspired VR action game for VR that is coming in 2020. 

Learn more: https://swordreverie.com

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SwordReverie/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/SwordReverie
Discord: https://discord.gg/dUnGj3f
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/SwordReverie/

Platforms: PC VR (Oculus + Steam VR). PSVR and Quest are also possible at a later date.

Get summoned to save a different world as an anime protagonist. Use JRPG inspired abilities and physics-based combat to defeat enemies.

Sword Reverie is inspired by our favorite Japanese games and anime such as Legend of Zelda, Ni No Kuni, and SAO and is being developed by a team of with experience at Microsoft and ArenaNet, among others.
